Bref, de l‚Äôext√©rieur vous ressemblez √† un maniaque des maths, on ne respecte pas ceux-l√†.
Anon

Hi, guys, I wonder if someone lives nearby Petrogradskaya metro station and want to join me, to jog around someimes, or cycling, sometimes meditating, sometimes talking and connecting mentally and spiritually.

We are spiritual beings having human experiences.
The emptyness, unknown or unclear things we feel periodically is because we aren‚Äôt fulfilled mentally and spiritually, because of our problems, traumas we had in childhood or some other times. 
I lived before in a simpler surrounding and last years I live in a places where people really greedy abt the material! 
Most people live this reality and I don‚Äôt judge them at all and i‚Äôm partly one of all these people.
So the thing any successful person came to before he became to success is that he needs strong disciplines and concepts, that the material doesn‚Äôt come under our control until we understand how things really work not only in a material way.

As Dostoyevsky says, the person who can control his temptations in any situation he is the god of himself. And he meant here not control but harmony. Because control means there is a resistance, and resistance leads to do what we resist at the end of the day.

I don‚Äôt believe being close to someone is just by actions and long term relationships, telling someone about ours secrets doesn‚Äôt make him close, but the real closeness is when the person knows about all our flwas before the good qualities and he loves us and will love us anyway. 

Everybody wants to be able to be himself but he can‚Äôt because have to be on the line with the one/ones he loves. 

Anyway, at the moment, this period of my life I‚Äôm going through transformation in my life, and feel I can meet those who I would be surprised of if met!

I was thinking to just live by myself and things will come themselves, but then I decided to do something from my side, like writing this post, this might be a good step. 

I know Russian well, but I don‚Äôt think I would be able to express what I expressed so well in Russian, so I decided to do so in one of my native languages.

I know there are some guys who maybe will be kidding or mocking this post, but it‚Äôs ok, I really accept that.

However, waiting for those who could match my energy!

Love and peace. 

Anonymous please!
